dict.acceptation: 缓慢地，慢吞吞地，慢腾腾地；慢条斯理地，不慌不忙地，袅袅；迟钝，痴痴呆呆地；逐步；

sent.orig: Slowly, slowly everything settles by this simple formula and there is no for the technique.
sent.trans: 渐渐、渐渐地，藉著这个简单的法则，每一件事都会安定下来，那麽就不需要技巧了。

sent.orig: Take a deep breath inhaling slowly and exhaling slowly.
sent.trans: 深呼吸，慢慢吸进，慢慢呼出。

sent.orig: Pure solvent fast, resin adding volatile liquid slowly, then more slowly pigments.
sent.trans: 纯溶剂挥发快，树脂液挥发慢，加入颜料后就更慢。

sent.orig: Liu Xiangyang in command, The crane slowly moving forward, the floor is also slowly rising.
sent.trans: 在刘向阳的指挥下，吊臂缓缓地移动着，楼板也慢慢地上升。

sent.orig: Breathe in slowly, and then exhale slowly.
